attributes.action: Help people who have only become self employed in there first year.
attributes.additional_details: I’ve been self employed for less than a year. Which meant I was not eligible to receive the self employed grants. I think there is a massive gap which the government has not fulfilled for people like me. Please sign this petition to support yourselves and other self employed people a round you.
attributes.background: I believe that there should be a grant for the newly self employed people to help get through this pandemic and not slip through the net like last time.
